meaningMnemonic: You cut the <radical>flowers</radical> off the <radical>grain</radical> with your <radical>knife</radical>. The flowers that fall off are <kanji>jasmine</kanji> flowers.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>jasmine</kanji> is growing out of everything, not just grain! It's also growing out of the <reading>ree</reading>ds (り)!
